TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MediaCodecInfo/CodecCapabilities extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the capabilities of a given codec component, i.e. what profile/level combinations it supports and what colorspaces it is capable of providing the decoded data in.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
